Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! Product Description Our manufacturers: BoShiYa is an arts and crafts manufacturers. Have 10 years of history.Mainly engaged in the business of the pocket watch and watch, has its own factory and professional design team, well-equipped, strong technical force.Company have a special quality control, strict control of product quality, reasonable price and fashion design.Our products have been customer recognition, can satisfy the needs of economic and social changes.Nest, display cabinet since the new and old customers from all walks of life to contact us, BoShiYa will provide the best quality service! Features: Stainless Steel case and alloy chain Elegant design with precise mechanical movement Skeleton and transparent dial shows exquisite movement and structure within the watch Removable stainless steel chain with a clip at the end Classic series pocket watch is a good present for your love, seniority or yourself Measurements: Case diameter: approx. 4.6 cm Case thickness: approx. 1.5 cm (cover included) Chain length: approx. 37.5 cm (hook included) Watch weight: approx. 76 g Package includes: 1 * Pocket watch 1 * Chain 1 * Box Instructions: Once you receive the mechanical watch, open the watch first. Press the crown at the top of watch, the front plate will open. Setting time: pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until it reaches the exact time. Winding the watch: push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation 20 times; Please do not over winding up the watch if you feel the crown is tight. - Luxury Golden Hollow Case Double Display. - Roman Numberals and White Dial. - Great Gift For Family And Friends. - Come with Gift Box. Golden Case Stainless Steel Vintage Hollow Watch with Belt Clip Pocket Chain.
